message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to consider $9,000?
I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $9,500.
